sub_title: Marine Geologist | Geologist | Geochemist | Researcher | Earth Scientist | PhD Marine Geology
summary:
I am a geologist and geochemist, dealing with hard rock geology, marine geology and geochemistry, applied to studies of the genesis of magma sources. My research area is Lithospheric petrology/geochemistry, igneous petrogenesis and earth interior geodynamics using an integrated approach by combining geology and geochemistry.

I have contributed few publications in, Contribution to Mineralogy and Petrology, Arabian Journal of Geosciences, Periodico Di Mineralogia, Journal of Himalayan Earth Sciences
